job_city: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Implementation at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Implementation transforms new customers into power users. We lead the onboarding experience for companies adopting Brex Empower, helping them shift from outdated processes to a modern, employee-first approach. It’s a role that blends customer empathy, project management, technical expertise, process design, and change management. We take personal ownership of our customers&#39; long-term success, and we set customers up thoroughly so they can be with ‘Brex for life’. As strategic advisors, we build trust, drive solutions with tenacity, deliver results fast, and work cross-functionally to make adoption seamless for customers.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;You’ll be a front-line manager to a team of Consultants who will be responsible for implementing customers on to the Brex Empower platform. If you enjoy building teams (involved with the strategy and scaling) at a fast-growing company, this is the role for you. Your role will be cross-functional, working with leaders across sales, finance, product, customer success, customer support and engineering. You’ll be helping to develop &amp;amp; enforce the implementation methodology which will be used to scale the team.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Salt Lake City office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Manage a team of Consultants and provide 1:1 mentoring and coaching i.e. convert consultants from ‘good’ to ‘great’&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Align with Brex’s broader strategy &amp;amp; ensure the team executes the strategy in partnership with other relevant cross-functional teams Leverage reporting dashboards (in Looker / Salesforce / and other tools) to monitor the success of our customers, the performance of the team and generate actionable insights on improving underperformance&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Contribute to the strategy of the team - you will be expected to write memos around new processes/ideas. Where needed, be prepared to own &amp;amp; execute on these ideas&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Maintain a pulse on product release features and anticipates the need to adopt best practices and knowledge-share across the department to communicate the commercial impact&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Educated on the different ways the system can be utilized/configured to improve the customer business process and training our implementation consultants on best practice. Be able to step in and run an implementation if needed&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strategically engage with high-value customers to proactively mitigate risks e.g. sponsor syncs etc.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Support the team in escalation management i.e. a proven framework for ‘weather the storms’&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Apply an AI native approach to all aspects of management&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Create a positive, encouraging culture that connects and engages the team and individuals&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Inspire and motivate your team to provide exceptional levels of quality to our customers&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Hold a high performance bar. Be prepared to hold individuals accountable if they are not consistently meeting the expectations.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Foster a bi-directional relationship with cross-functional leaders in order to align on strategies, incentives, feedback &amp;amp; improvement opportunities&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Use qualitative &amp;amp; quantitative data to perform post-implementation retro’s with cross-functional counterparts in order to apply learnings in the future&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Hire, develop and retain the people on the team. Ensure the hiring strategy is in alignment to Brex’s strategy &amp;amp; the needs of the team&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;5+ years of previous management experience at a b2b SaaS company or financial services company in an implementation or customer success role&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;10+ years of previous Global Implementation experience in Financial, Expense Management, or ERP Software space&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in project management and product configuration in software implementation services&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proven record of converting direct reports from ‘good’ to ‘great’&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experienced leader who can inspire teams to provide exceptional levels of quality&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in capacity &amp;amp; resource management&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in leveraging AI tools to power your management workflows&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Comfort leading customer engagements that may contain both technical and non-technical work streams&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;A natural willingness to operate at all levels i.e. from strategic to tactical&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building out an Implementation department at a fast-growing software company&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $188,000 - $235,000 USD. &amp;nbsp;However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Senior Manager, Implementation
location: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
locations: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Implementation at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Implementation transforms new customers into power users. It’s a role that blends customer empathy, project management, technical expertise, process design, and change management. We take personal ownership of our customers&#39; long-term success, and we set customers up thoroughly so they can be with ‘Brex for life’. As strategic advisors, we build trust, drive solutions with tenacity, deliver results fast, and work cross-functionally to make adoption seamless for customers.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;You’ll be a front-line manager to a team of Consultants who will be responsible for implementing customers on to the Brex Empower platform. If you enjoy building teams (involved with the strategy and scaling) at a fast-growing company, this is the role for you. Your role will be cross-functional, working with leaders across sales, finance, product, customer success, customer support and engineering. You’ll be helping to develop &amp;amp; enforce the implementation methodology which will be used to scale the team.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Seattle office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Manage a team of Consultants and provide 1:1 mentoring and coaching i.e. convert consultants from ‘good’ to ‘great’&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Align with Brex’s broader strategy &amp;amp; ensure the team executes the strategy in partnership with other relevant cross-functional teams Leverage reporting dashboards (in Looker / Salesforce / and other tools) to monitor the success of our customers, the performance of the team and generate actionable insights on improving underperformance&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Contribute to the strategy of the team - you will be expected to write memos around new processes/ideas. Where needed, be prepared to own &amp;amp; execute on these ideas&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Maintain a pulse on product release features and anticipates the need to adopt best practices and knowledge-share across the department to communicate the commercial impact&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Educated on the different ways the system can be utilized/configured to improve the customer business process and training our implementation consultants on best practice. Be able to step in and run an implementation if needed&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strategically engage with high-value customers to proactively mitigate risks e.g. sponsor syncs etc.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Support the team in escalation management i.e. a proven framework for ‘weather the storms’&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Apply an AI native approach to all aspects of management&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Create a positive, encouraging culture that connects and engages the team and individuals&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Inspire and motivate your team to provide exceptional levels of quality to our customers&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Hold a high performance bar. Be prepared to hold individuals accountable if they are not consistently meeting the expectations.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Foster a bi-directional relationship with cross-functional leaders in order to align on strategies, incentives, feedback &amp;amp; improvement opportunities&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Use qualitative &amp;amp; quantitative data to perform post-implementation retro’s with cross-functional counterparts in order to apply learnings in the future&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Hire, develop and retain the people on the team. Ensure the hiring strategy is in alignment to Brex’s strategy &amp;amp; the needs of the team&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;5+ years of previous management experience at a b2b SaaS company or financial services company in an implementation or customer success role&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;10+ years of previous Global Implementation experience in Financial, Expense Management, or ERP Software space&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in project management and product configuration in software implementation services&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proven record of converting direct reports from ‘good’ to ‘great’&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experienced leader who can inspire teams to provide exceptional levels of quality&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in capacity &amp;amp; resource management&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in leveraging AI tools to power your management workflows&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Comfort leading customer engagements that may contain both technical and non-technical work streams&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;A natural willingness to operate at all levels i.e. from strategic to tactical&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building out an Implementation department at a fast-growing software company&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $212,000 - $260,000 USD. &amp;nbsp;However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Be able to step in and run an implementation if needed&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strategically engage with high-value customers to proactively mitigate risks e.g. sponsor syncs etc.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Support the team in escalation management i.e. a proven framework for ‘weather the storms’&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Apply an AI native approach to all aspects of management&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Create a positive, encouraging culture that connects and engages the team and individuals&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Inspire and motivate your team to provide exceptional levels of quality to our customers&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Hold a high performance bar. Be prepared to hold individuals accountable if they are not consistently meeting the expectations.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Foster a bi-directional relationship with cross-functional leaders in order to align on strategies, incentives, feedback &amp;amp; improvement opportunities&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Use qualitative &amp;amp; quantitative data to perform post-implementation retro’s with cross-functional counterparts in order to apply learnings in the future&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Hire, develop and retain the people on the team. Ensure the hiring strategy is in alignment to Brex’s strategy &amp;amp; the needs of the team&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;5+ years of previous management experience at a b2b SaaS company or financial services company in an implementation or customer success role&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;10+ years of previous Global Implementation experience in Financial, Expense Management, or ERP Software space&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in project management and product configuration in software implementation services&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proven record of converting direct reports from ‘good’ to ‘great’&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experienced leader who can inspire teams to provide exceptional levels of quality&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in capacity &amp;amp; resource management&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in leveraging AI tools to power your management workflows&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Comfort leading customer engagements that may contain both technical and non-technical work streams&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;A natural willingness to operate at all levels i.e. from strategic to tactical&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building out an Implementation department at a fast-growing software company&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $212,000 - $260,000 USD. &amp;nbsp;However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Senior Manager, Implementation

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Marketing at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;The Marketing team tells the Brex story, determines messaging and positioning, and translates our products and features into tangible customer benefits. Our marketers — across Revenue Marketing, Product Marketing, and Brand Marketing — are responsible for acquiring new customers and have a deep understanding of the business. We’re a highly cross-functional team and partner most closely with the Product, Sales, Business Development, and Design teams to show our prospects and customers how we can help them reach their full potential.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;As the Partner Marketing Manager at Brex, you’ll be responsible for developing and executing co-marketing strategies with key strategic, accounting, and ecosystem partners. You’ll work closely with the Sr. Partner Marketing Manager, business development, sales, and product teams to drive pipeline, customer engagement, and brand awareness through partner-driven campaigns and programs.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p class=&quot;p1&quot;&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Develop and execute partner marketing plans aligned with Brex’s GTM strategy and partner objectives.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Build and manage joint campaigns with partners (e.g., webinars, content, events, and digital campaigns) to drive awareness and demand.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Handle event lead uploads, follow-up outreach sequences, and pre/post-event internal communications to ensure high lead conversion.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Collaborate with product marketing, campaign, and brand teams to ensure consistent messaging across partner channels.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Create enablement content and marketing kits to support partner sales teams.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Analyze and report on campaign performance, optimizing based on insights and feedback.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Act as the marketing point of contact for assigned partners, ensuring smooth coordination and communication.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Support co-branded initiatives and content development (e.g., case studies, blog posts, landing pages).&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Manage marketing relationships with partner stakeholders, ensuring alignment on goals and timelines.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;3+ years of experience in partner, channel, or B2B marketing (fintech or SaaS preferred).&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proven track record of planning and executing co-marketing campaigns that drive measurable business outcomes.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong project management skills and attention to detail.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Excellent communication and relationship-building skills, with experience working cross-functionally.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced, high-growth environment.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Familiarity with CRM and marketing tools (e.g., Salesforce, Looker, Retool, Marketo, Monday.com, Splash Event Management).&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus Point:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with financial or payments partner ecosystems&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with ERP, VAR, or e-commerce partners&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with Accounting partners&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Knowledge of the Saas enterprise partner ecosystem or accounting channel&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Passion for innovation in financial technology and simplifying financial operations for businesses&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $131,000-$163,000 USD.&amp;nbsp; However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors, including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Senior Partner Marketing Manager

Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. title: Senior Partner Marketing Manager
location: New York, New York, United States
locations: New York, New York, United States

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Engineering at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Engineering at Brex is about building systems that scale with speed and intention. Our teams span Software, Data, Security, and IT, and operate with high autonomy and deep collaboration. We tackle hard technical problems, own our outcomes, and push for excellence at every level — from architecture to deployment. It’s an environment where engineering is a craft, and builders become leaders.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As a Full-Stack Senior Software Engineer on our Users team, you will work across the entire Brex stack to build solutions that manage user lifecycles and integrate with HRIS systems - core to support all Brex products and critical for maintaining enterprise onboarding processes. You will have the opportunity to learn and push the frontier of providing the best enterprise onboarding processes and supporting a large, high-performing engineering team.&amp;nbsp; You’ll be encouraged to be metric and data-driven and to think creatively to help Brex scale and get prepared for the new markets we are about to enter.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;We’re looking for folks with not only an interest in building products and tools but also in leading multi-functional projects with lots of moving pieces. In this role, you’ll have the opportunity to drive direct business impact and shape our long-term technical vision with a high-quality bar.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in the office - Monday, Wednesday, and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work with engineers across the company to build new features and products end-to-end&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own problems end-to-end, thinking through everything from user experience, data models, scalability, operability and ongoing metrics.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Provide technical leadership to team by driving roadmap direction, architectural design and mentorship&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work side-by-side with user-facing teams (Sales, Support) to best understand the needs of our customers.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Tune and polish features to a high degree of excellence.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Identify and implement reliability and performance improvements&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Uphold our high engineering standards and bring consistency to the codebases, infrastructure, and processes you will encounter&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;8+ years of professional experience with a focus on frontend development with React alongside designing, developing, and deploying full-stack products&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience developing software for the Web platform, including cross-browser compatibility&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in architecting, developing, and testing client-side code end-to-end&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building and designing scalable backend systems&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Platform or Full-Stack development experience preferably in Kotlin(Java, Scala and Groovy are also acceptable)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience with modern technologies and tools like ES6+, React, Typescript, GraphQL &amp;amp; Webpack&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with SQL or NoSQL databases&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Kubernetes familiarity&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience Tech Leading projects across a group of engineers&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience collaborating with cross-functional stakeholders and specialists in product, design, and operations&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience in Tech Leading teams&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience driving initiatives at a broader level across an organization or company&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience running in-product experiments, A/B testing&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience and interest in leveraging AI developer tools&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Effective writing skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Track record of identifying and fixing problems.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong data-stringify-type=&quot;bold&quot;&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $192,000 - $240,000. However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors, including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt; &lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Senior Software Engineer, Full-Stack

job_city: New York, New York, United States
job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Engineering at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Engineering at Brex is about building systems that scale with speed and intention. Our teams span Software, Data, Security, and IT, and operate with high autonomy and deep collaboration. We tackle hard technical problems, own our outcomes, and push for excellence at every level — from architecture to deployment. It’s an environment where engineering is a craft, and builders become leaders.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As an engineer at Brex, you will help develop new products from concept to launch, whether for a 5-person startup or a 5,000-person-strong enterprise. We’re looking for folks with an interest in building products and tools, and who are comfortable in dealing with lots of moving pieces. You’ll be building customer-facing products that will drive direct business impact and shape our long-term technical vision with a high-quality bar. You&#39;ll have the opportunity to learn and push the frontier of providing the best financial software experience to help companies grow. You’ll be encouraged to be metric and data-driven and to think creatively to help Brex scale and get prepared for the new markets we are about to enter.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our New York Office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require 3 days per week in the office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own functionality and scalability features by taking responsibility from inception to deployment.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Be responsible for full software development lifecycle - design, development, testing, operating in production&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Uphold our high engineering standards and bring consistency to the codebases, infrastructure, and processes you will encounter.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;7+ years of professional experience in a software engineering role or equivalent experience&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building and designing scalable backend systems&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with SQL or NoSQL databases&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working with backend programming languages (Java, Kotlin, Python)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Familiarity with software engineering development cycles&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to hold yourself and the team to high standards&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong communication and interpersonal skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li data-stringify-indent=&quot;0&quot; data-stringify-border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;English proficiency/fluency, both written and speaking (note: interviews will be conducted in English)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience collaborating with experts in product, design, and operations.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Familiarity with functional programming languages&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience driving initiatives at a broader level across an organization or company&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong writing skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proactive approach&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
